Change Log
==========

0.0.1 (09.05.2021)
------------------
- BertDataset & BertDataLoaderFactory

0.0.2 (09.05.2021)
------------------
- Minor bags fixed

0.0.3 (14.05.2021)
------------------
- PreProcConst
- ModuleConst
- EmbModeConst
- PreAggModeConst, PostAggModeConst, AggModeConst
- PreTransModeConst, PostTransModeConst

- TokenizedDataset & TokenizedDataLoaderFactory
    DEPRICATED : BertDataset & BertDataLoaderFactory

- EmbeddingModule

- ModuleChain & ModuleChainFactory
- TransitionModule

- AggregationModule & AggregationModuleFactory

- SemanticAggregator

0.0.4 (14.05.2021)
------------------
- Minor bags fixed

0.0.5 (14.05.2021)
------------------
- Fine managment of gradient calculation
- Minor bags fixed

0.0.6 (14.05.2021)
------------------
- Minor bags fixed

0.0.7 (20.05.2021)
------------------
- ModuleConst:
    DEPRICATED  : AGGRG, DISTR, VECSPLIT,
    CREATED     : MIDDL

- MdlModeConst:
    DEPRICATED  : AggModeConst

- ChainModule & ChainModuleFactory:
    DEPRICATED  : ModuleChain, ModuleChainFactory,
    UPDATED     : TransitionModule

- MiddleModule:
    DEPRICATED  : AggregationModule,
    UPDATED     : AggregationModuleFactory

- SemanticAnalyzer:
    DEPRICATED  : SemanticAggregator

- Type annotations updated
- Minor bags fixed
